parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "SLURM",
  "details": {
    "software": [
      "Python",
      "NVIDIA PyTorch 20.12",
      "Megatron-LM",
      "SLURM"
    ],
    "resources": {
      "nodes": 512,
      "tasks_per_node": 8,
      "gpus": 8,
      "micro_batch_size": 4,
      "global_batch_size": 2048,
      "tensor_parallel_size": 2,
      "pipeline_parallel_size": 1,
      "datasets": [
        "<PATH TO THE FIRST DATASET>",
        "<PATH TO THE SECOND DATASET>",
        "<PATH TO THE THIRD DATASET>"
      ],
      "model_checkpoint": "PATH TO THE MODEL CHECKPOINT",
      "save_checkpoint_path": "PATH TO SAVE MODEL CHECKPOINT",
      "tokenizer_path": "PATH OR NAME FOR PRETRAINED TOKENIZER",
      "tensorboard_dir": "TENSORBOARD DIRECTORY",
      "container_image": "nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:20.12-py3",
      "container_mounts": "<DIRECTORIES TO MOUNT>"
    }
  }
}
```
